Sentencas: In the context of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) applications, mixed-ionic electronic conductors offer significant advantages over conventional cathodes especially in the intermediate-to-low range of temperatures where the performance of the cathode is of fundamental importance.
Titulo: Advances in layered oxide cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An increasing number of layered oxide materials have been found to present excellent properties as mixed ionic-electronic conductors.
Titulo: Advances in layered oxide cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, considerable efforts have been recently devoted to better understand and evaluate layered ordered structures.
Titulo: Advances in layered oxide cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This article highlights the most important advances in this topic concentrating on both structural aspects and impact in cathode performance for SOFCs applications.
Titulo: Advances in layered oxide cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
